revised_title: Inter-Traction: A Further Study on Fluid Mixing Phenomena
tldr: The author presents a new technique to study inter-traction, a phenomenon where fluids mix due to the impulsion of a force. This technique involves using a filter paper disc with an albuminous fluid on a cover-glass, floated on a hypertonic salt solution. The resulting streaming effects, called inter-traction, can be observed and analyzed. This research expands upon previous studies on inter-traction and its mechanisms.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
